headline: Easy White Chili II
name: Easy White Chili II
description: This slow cooker recipe uses chicken bouillon cubes and navy beans with chicken to make a hearty white chili.
recipeIngredient: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chilies, undrained
1 (48 ounce) jar navy beans, rinsed and drained

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the chicken, green chilies, salsa, chicken bouillon, navy beans, and water in a slow cooker.
Cook on High until the chicken falls apart, about 4 hours.
Mash the chili with a potato masher to give a thicker texture, if desired.
